name: Enchanted Mix
description:
Spooky occurrences wait for you in the enchanted mansion, where even the tableware comes alive! Try to satisfy the spirits of the house in this logic-based puzzle game by discovering the rules that dictate how objects in each room combine. 

Controls

Mouse: Move objects

Escape Key: Return to level select

Credits (Alphabetical)

Adrienn Tindall : Game Design and Programming
